about_section.title: About Me
about_section.introduction_paragraph: As a Fullstack Developer passionate about creating comprehensive solutions, my expertise focuses on designing and implementing robust web applications with Java and Spring Boot on the backend, and developing dynamic, accessible user interfaces with React. My approach goes beyond code: I am driven by the ability to transform complex ideas into intuitive and efficient experiences, always seeking innovation. My curiosity leads me to actively explore the intersections between Fullstack development and Generative Artificial Intelligence, applying Prompt Engineering principles to enhance software creation.
about_section.philosophy_quote: I firmly believe in writing clean, maintainable code and always prioritizing the end-user experience. I focus on continuously delivering value through robust and scalable solutions, actively exploring the potential of AI.

projects_section.title: Featured Projects
projects_section.project1_title: Integrated Management System: Clients, Employees & Suppliers
projects_section.project1_description: Enterprise Full Stack application designed for the efficient management of Clients, Employees, and Suppliers, implementing complete CRUD operations and a robust REST API with Java and Spring Boot. This integrated project demonstrates my proficiency in building adaptive user interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS, managing data persistence with SQL databases (PostgreSQL and MySQL), and skills in Docker containerization and cloud deployment across Google Cloud Platform and Render.com. It features two main branches: 'main' for local configuration (MySQL/GCP) and 'render-deploy' optimized for deployment on Render.com (PostgreSQL), showcasing my ability to adapt and operate solutions in diverse environments.
projects_section.project2_title: InmoRISM: Real Estate Platform with Microservices (Java/Spring)
projects_section.project2_description: InmoRISM is an advanced web platform for real estate management, designed under a robust microservices architecture with Java and Spring Boot. It demonstrates my expertise in implementing distributed systems, including Service Discovery (Eureka), inter-service communication (Feign Client), and resilience patterns (Circuit Breaker with Resilience4j). It manages users, a property catalog, and the purchase process, highlighting skills in security (JWT, Spring Security), diverse databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL), testing (JUnit/Mockito), and API documentation (Swagger). The user interface is server-rendered with Thymeleaf.

experience_section.title: Experience & Achievements
project_description_points: Designed and implemented a microservices architecture with Java 21 and Spring Boot for a real estate portal.
Developed independent services (API Gateway, Properties, Purchases) and Service Discovery with Netflix Eureka.
Integrated advanced security with Spring Security and JWT-based authentication for access and role control.
Applied resilience patterns like Circuit Breaker (Resilience4j) to ensure the robustness of the distributed system.
Efficient inter-service communication using Feign Client and user context propagation.
Implemented CRUD operations for users, properties, and transactions, with persistence in PostgreSQL and MySQL.
Developed unit tests with JUnit 5 and Mockito, ensuring code quality and business logic.
Interactive API documentation with Swagger (OpenAPI 3) for easy consumption and collaboration.
Containerization of services with Docker and dependency management with Maven.
